facts.fact_text: Ecuador’s annual inflation accelerated to 2.44% in January 2026 from 1.91% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Ecuador’s annual inflation accelerated to 2.44% in January 2026 from 1.91% in December

facts.fact_text: The sharpest rise in Ecuador's inflation since May 2024.

Largest increases in Ecuador were recorded in housing and utilities (20.79%), healthcare (3.13%), alcoholic beverages and tobacco (1.43%), restaurants and hotels (1.47%), and food and non-alcoholic beverages (2.09%).

evidences.evidence_text: The largest increases were recorded in housing and utilities (20.79%), healthcare (3.13%), alcoholic beverages and tobacco (1.43%), restaurants and hotels (1.47%), and food and non-alcoholic beverages (2.09%).

facts.fact_text: Deflation was recorded in clothing and footwear (-4.89%), recreation and culture (-2.54%), and communications (-0.28%) in Ecuador.

evidences.evidence_text: Deflation was recorded in clothing and footwear (-4.89%), recreation and culture (-2.54%), and communications (-0.28%).

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, consumer prices rose 0.37% in January in Ecuador.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, consumer prices rose 0.37% in January

facts.fact_text: Consumer prices in Ecuador declined 0.14% in December.

evidence.evidence_text: Ecuador Inflation Accelerates the Most in 20 Months
Ecuador Inflation Accelerates the Most in 20 Months
